column1: # The January 1913 figure is shown in brackets on the sheet without explanation. It has been retained.
# 1914 and 1915 figures (bracketed on the sheet) have been omitted. The values were computed from Dalton Holme.
# The grounds of Dalton Hall are extensive and there is no clear indication of where the rain gauge was located.
# The grid reference is for the Hall building.
